problem_names:
lemma nat_k_induct: 
  fixes k::nat
  assumes "\<forall>i<k. P i" and "\<forall>n\<^sub>0. (\<forall>i<k. P (n\<^sub>0+i)) \<longrightarrow> P (n\<^sub>0+k)"
  shows "P (n::nat)"

lemma fix_ind_k:
  fixes k::nat
  assumes adm: "adm P"
  assumes base_k_steps: "\<forall>i<k. P (iterate i\<cdot>f\<cdot>\<bottom>)"
  assumes step: "\<And>x. (\<forall>i<k.  P (iterate i\<cdot>f\<cdot>x)) \<Longrightarrow> P (iterate k\<cdot>f\<cdot>x)"
  shows "P (fix\<cdot>f)"

lemma nat_k_skip_induct:
  fixes k::nat
  assumes "k \<ge> 1" and "\<forall>i<k. P i" and "\<forall>n\<^sub>0. P (n\<^sub>0) \<longrightarrow> P (n\<^sub>0+k)"
  shows "P (n::nat)"

lemma fix_ind_k_skip:
  fixes k::nat
  assumes k_1: "k \<ge> 1"
  assumes adm: "adm P"
  assumes base_k_steps: "\<forall>i<k. P (iterate i\<cdot>f\<cdot>\<bottom>)"
  assumes step: "\<And>x. P x \<Longrightarrow> P (iterate k\<cdot>f\<cdot>x)"
  shows "P (fix\<cdot>f)"

lemma parallel_fix_ind_inc:
  assumes adm: "adm (\<lambda>x. P (fst x) (snd x))"
  assumes base_fst: "\<And>y. P \<bottom> y" and base_snd: "\<And>x. P x \<bottom>"
  assumes step: "\<And>x y. P x y \<Longrightarrow> P (G\<cdot>x) y \<Longrightarrow> P x (H\<cdot>y) \<Longrightarrow> P (G\<cdot>x) (H\<cdot>y)"
  shows "P (fix\<cdot>G) (fix\<cdot>H)"
translations:
lemma nat_k_induct: 
  fixes k::nat
  assumes "\<forall>i<k. P i" and "\<forall>n\<^sub>0. (\<forall>i<k. P (n\<^sub>0+i)) \<longrightarrow> P (n\<^sub>0+k)"
  shows "P (n::nat)"

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>n. \<forall>m<n. P m \<Longrightarrow> P n

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>m<n. P m

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>n. \<forall>m<n. P m \<Longrightarrow> P n

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>m<n. P m

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P n

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<forall>m<n. P m; n < k\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P n
 2. \<lbrakk>\<forall>m<n. P m; \<not> n < k\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P n

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>i<k. P i

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<forall>m<n. P m; n < k\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P n
 2. \<lbrakk>\<forall>m<n. P m; \<not> n < k\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P n

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<forall>m<n. P m; \<not> n < k\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P n

proof (prove)
using this:
  (\<And>i. i < k \<Longrightarrow> P (n - k + i)) \<Longrightarrow>
  P (n - k + k)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<forall>m<n. P m; \<not> n < k\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P n

proof (state)
this:
  P n

goal:
No subgoals!

lemma fix_ind_k:
  fixes k::nat
  assumes adm: "adm P"
  assumes base_k_steps: "\<forall>i<k. P (iterate i\<cdot>f\<cdot>\<bottom>)"
  assumes step: "\<And>x. (\<forall>i<k.  P (iterate i\<cdot>f\<cdot>x)) \<Longrightarrow> P (iterate k\<cdot>f\<cdot>x)"
  shows "P (fix\<cdot>f)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P (\<Squnion>i. iterate i\<cdot>f\<cdot>\<bottom>)
apply(rule nat_k_induct[of k], simp add: base_k_steps)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>i.
       \<forall>n\<^sub>0.
          (\<forall>i<k.
              P (iterate (n\<^sub>0 + i)\<cdot>f\<cdot>
                 \<bottom>)) \<longrightarrow>
          P (iterate (n\<^sub>0 + k)\<cdot>f\<cdot>\<bottom>)

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>i<k. P (iterate i\<cdot>f\<cdot>?x) \<Longrightarrow>
  P (iterate k\<cdot>f\<cdot>?x)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>i.
       \<forall>n\<^sub>0.
          (\<forall>i<k.
              P (iterate (n\<^sub>0 + i)\<cdot>f\<cdot>
                 \<bottom>)) \<longrightarrow>
          P (iterate (n\<^sub>0 + k)\<cdot>f\<cdot>\<bottom>)

  \<forall>m<n. P m

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P n

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):

 2. \<lbrakk>\<forall>m<n. P m; \<not> n < k\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P n

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>i<k. P i

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<forall>m<n. P m; n < k\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P n
 2. \<lbrakk>\<forall>m<n. P m; \<not> n < k\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P n

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<forall>m<n. P m; \<not> n < k\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P n

proof (prove)
using this:
  P (n - k) \<Longrightarrow> P (n - k + k)
  1 \<le> k

goal (1 subgoal):

  P n

lemma fix_ind_k_skip:
  fixes k::nat
  assumes k_1: "k \<ge> 1"
  assumes adm: "adm P"
  assumes base_k_steps: "\<forall>i<k. P (iterate i\<cdot>f\<cdot>\<bottom>)"
  assumes step: "\<And>x. P x \<Longrightarrow> P (iterate k\<cdot>f\<cdot>x)"
  shows "P (fix\<cdot>f)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P (\<Squnion>i. iterate i\<cdot>f\<cdot>\<bottom>)

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>i. 1 \<le> k
 2. \<And>i. \<forall>i<k. P (iterate i\<cdot>f\<cdot>\<bottom>)
 3. \<And>i.
       \<forall>n\<^sub>0.
          P (iterate n\<^sub>0\<cdot>f\<cdot>\<bottom>) \<longrightarrow>
          P (iterate (n\<^sub>0 + k)\<cdot>f\<cdot>\<bottom>)

proof (prove)
using this:
  1 \<le> k
  \<forall>i<k. P (iterate i\<cdot>f\<cdot>\<bottom>)

goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>i. 1 \<le> k
 2. \<And>i. \<forall>i<k. P (iterate i\<cdot>f\<cdot>\<bottom>)
 3. \<And>i.
       \<forall>n\<^sub>0.
          P (iterate n\<^sub>0\<cdot>f\<cdot>\<bottom>) \<longrightarrow>
          P (iterate (n\<^sub>0 + k)\<cdot>f\<cdot>\<bottom>)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>n\<^sub>0.
       \<lbrakk>Suc 0 \<le> k;
        \<forall>i<k. P (iterate i\<cdot>f\<cdot>\<bottom>);
        P (iterate n\<^sub>0\<cdot>f\<cdot>\<bottom>)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P (iterate (n\<^sub>0 + k)\<cdot>f\<cdot>\<bottom>)

lemma parallel_fix_ind_inc:
  assumes adm: "adm (\<lambda>x. P (fst x) (snd x))"
  assumes base_fst: "\<And>y. P \<bottom> y" and base_snd: "\<And>x. P x \<bottom>"
  assumes step: "\<And>x y. P x y \<Longrightarrow> P (G\<cdot>x) y \<Longrightarrow> P x (H\<cdot>y) \<Longrightarrow> P (G\<cdot>x) (H\<cdot>y)"
  shows "P (fix\<cdot>G) (fix\<cdot>H)"

proof (chain)
picking this:
  adm (\<lambda>x. P (fst x) (snd x))

proof (prove)
using this:
  adm (\<lambda>x. P (fst x) (snd x))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. adm (\<lambda>(x, y). P x y)

proof (prove)
using this:
  adm (\<lambda>x. P (fst x) (snd x))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. adm (\<lambda>p. P (fst p) (snd p))

proof (state)
this:
  adm (\<lambda>(x, y). P x y)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P (fix\<cdot>G) (fix\<cdot>H)
